nav.selectNote: Select a note to view or edit

hero.subtitle: The agent-native knowledge platform for the modern mind. Local-first, privacy-focused, and infinitely extensible.

features.label: WHAT IT DOES
features.title: Built for
features.subtitle: Six pillars that make Mino different from every other notes app.

smartImport.title: Smart Import
smartImport.description: Drop in web pages, emails, PDFs, voice memos, or YouTube videos. The AI agent formats and files them automatically.

aiOrganization.title: AI Organization
aiOrganization.description: Your notes organize themselves. The agent auto-tags, links related content, and maintains your knowledge graph.

intelligentRetrieval.title: Intelligent Retrieval
intelligentRetrieval.description: Semantic search across your entire vault. Ask questions in natural language and get synthesized answers.

selfHosted.title: Self-Hosted & Private
selfHosted.description: Your data stays yours. Deploy with one command, connect any client. Full control, zero vendor lock-in.

agentNative.title: Agent-Native API
agentNative.description: Built for AI agents first. MCP tools let Antigravity, Cursor, or any agent read and write your notes directly.

everywhere.title: Everywhere, Offline
everywhere.description: Web, iOS, Android — all offline-first with CRDT sync. Edit anywhere, conflicts resolve automatically.

howItWorks.label: HOW IT WORKS
howItWorks.title: From
howItWorks.subtitle: Three steps to a perfectly organized knowledge base.

step1.title: Capture Everything
step1.description: Write in markdown, import from anywhere, or dictate with voice. Every note is a plain .md file — no lock-in, ever.

step2.title: AI Organizes
step2.description: The agent reads your notes, auto-tags them, files them into the right folders, and creates links between related ideas.

step3.title: Retrieve Instantly
step3.description: Ask questions, search semantically, or browse your auto-generated knowledge graph. Your second brain, always up to date.

agent.label: THE KILLER FEATURE
agent.title: Meet the
agent.subtitle: Not a chatbot — a knowledge steward that works in the background.
agent.chatMsg1: I found 3 notes about "architecture" that aren't linked together. Want me to connect them and create a Map of Content?
agent.chatMsg2: Yes, and also tag them with #core-systems
agent.chatMsg3:
Done! I've:
• Linked all 3 architecture notes
• Created MOC-Architecture.md
• Added #core-systems to each
• Found 2 more related notes in /Research you might want to include
agent.capability1Desc: Reads content and applies relevant tags

tech.label: UNDER THE HOOD
tech.title: A Modern
tech.subtitle: Every choice made for performance, developer experience, and self-hosting simplicity.

openSource.label: OPEN SOURCE
openSource.title: Built in the Open
openSource.subtitle: Mino is 100% open-source. Self-host with one command, fork it, extend it, or contribute. Your notes are yours — forever.

cookieConsent.message: We use essential cookies to ensure the proper functioning of this site. No tracking cookies are used.

general.languageDesc: Choose your preferred language for the interface.
general.themeDesc: Switch between dark and light appearance.

channels.title: Messaging Channels
channels.subtitle: Connect Telegram and WhatsApp so the AI agent can process incoming messages.
channels.name: Channel Name
channels.noCredentialsRequired: No provider credentials are required for this channel.
channels.requiredCredentialsHint: Fill all required credentials before adding this channel.

plugins.title: Plugins
plugins.subtitle: Extend Mino with powerful integrations.

plugins.emptyServerTitle: No plugins found on the server.
plugins.emptyServerHint: Add plugins to your server's data directory to see them here.

docs.title: Documentation
docs.subtitle: Get started with Mino — guides, references, and integration notes.

link.description: Use a prefilled URL or enter server details manually.
link.noPrefill: No prefilled credentials were found in the URL. Paste server details above.

localDemo.noteBody: This is a local demo note. Changes are not persisted to a server.

agent.title: AI Assistant
agent.empty: Ask the assistant to find, summarize, or create notes for you.
